name: Modernized ICC Cloaks
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ A piece of Notum #L "Notum Fragment" "136624" or #L "Notum Chip" "136622" #L "Nano Programming Interface" "161699" #L "Inactive OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots" "164952" An ICC Cloak ( ie: #L "Worn ICC Bodyguard Cloak" "158750" ) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Nano Programming Interface + Inactive OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots = #L "Activated OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots" "164954" Skills: | NP,CH | ------------------------------ Notum + Activated OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots = #L "Stabilized OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots" "164956" Skills: | NP,CH | ------------------------------ Stabilized OT Metamorphing Liquid Nanobots + ICC Cloak = Modernized ICC Cloaks = Modernized ICC Cloaks #L "Modernized ICC Bodyguard Cloak" "164972" Skills: | NP,CH | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ It's only useful to change the look of the old ICC cloaks, nothing else.
